document_data.name: Flagons of the Fallen
document_data.mainbody: The '''Flagons of the Fallen''' was an important religious event celebrated by followers of [[Myrkul]], the Lord of Bones.
document_data.History: The Flagons of the Fallen served as the end point for the [[Day the Dead are Most With Us]] observance by Myrkulytes. Occurring at the end of the day on the [[Feast of the Moon]], the ceremony consisted of Myrkulytes using [[spell]]s to enflame glasses of [[wine]] so that any [[spirit]]s present would be briefly warmed before returning to the chill of the underworld.
